description: Certificate of Lawfulness for the erection of a hip to gable and rear roof extension to the house
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - On 22/04/2024, the proposal measuring 28.63 cubic metres as shown on the drawing submitted on 22/04/2024 and numbered Location Plan, CHR/01/02, CHR/01/03 and dated 03/07/2024 and numbered CHR/01/07/R3, CHR/01/06/R3, CHR/01/05/R3 and dated 17/07/2024 and numbered CHR/01/04/R1 was lawful because:
The development complies with the terms of Classes B and C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended)

Reason : 1 - On 22/04/2024, the proposal measuring 28.63 cubic metres as shown on the drawing submitted on 22/04/2024 and numbered Location Plan, and dated 03/07/2024 and numbered CHR/01/07/R3, CHR/01/06/R3, CHR/01/05/R3 and dated 17/07/2024 and numbered CHR/01/04/R1 was lawful because:The development complies with the terms of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended)
